text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Go- Good morning! I'm sorry for the trouble my awkwardness caused yesterday……! I'll do my best t-today—

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: …… I have a small suggestion about that… if you don' t mind?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: … Umm. You had a lot resting on you yesterday, didn't you, Rob Roy? Putting plans together, guiding us around and explaining, telling us what we should be doing…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: So how about I take care of those instructions for you? If you tell me what's needed I think I can handle that.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: …… Ahhh… Sorry. I uh… Thank you. It would take a load of my mind if you could……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text: Don't worry about it, just leave it to me. I, uhm, you know… seem to be rather skilled in doing the worrying myself and all.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Okay! I noted the switch's location and took a photo! I'll show everyone when I get back!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Me and Rob Roy will find the switch for the second stone, and Dober's group can have their revenge match at the Lonely River.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Such a cautious scheme… Hehe, how very Dober!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Yes. It's honestly… a little relieving to me. … Ahh, excuse me. The way home is… over… here…?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (…… Oh dear. I'll know for sure if I just check the book…… But, I can't take it out here……)

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Let's see…… it's this way……!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Okay and alrighty!

text_block_list.name: Rob Roy & Taiki
text_block_list.text: ―Gyaaaaaaah! ―Noooooooo!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: ―……Ouchie! No way, the road turned into a cliff～! It doesn't look like there's any place to climb up from here.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I'll LANE everyone in any case! "HELP ME!", and send! ……You're looking pretty pale, Rob Roy!?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: … I'm sorry, I'm so sorry! If only I had told you the truth… I could have simply checked the road in my book…!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I-it was the same yesterday, I should have told you…! We'd have never been in such trouble if we could have just checked the book before—!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Hey, calm down, Rob Roy! Are you okay? Take it easy… I'll hear you out, nice and slow!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: … The story, it's actually a children's book, not a movie… "Rhodonite and the Dream Stone", it's called.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Book……?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: If I had told the truth earlier…… I could have prevented a lot of trouble.…… I'm sorry.

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: ……… Aaah!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: That's why it sounded familiar! To think this was all about that book! The Lonely River, Gille Dubh's Garden, the Dreamstone……!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: …… Huh!? Y-You've read the book as well, Taiki……?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yes! When I was little me and my friends loved it! We used to read it together～!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: ―Hah!? Wa-Wa-Wait a minute! We've been walking through the world of that story, haven't we?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: That means… I have so many photos……! ―Ahaha!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Now that I look at it, this is exactly how I imagined the "Lonely River" to be! And the Spring of Undine, the forest, the animals……!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Even the human face tree and the red mushrooms, they were also in the story! Wasn't there a shoe-wearing cat around the red mushroom area?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Y-Yes, that's right……! There's a gathering of cait-shìth! That's when the villagers are asked to exterminate the kelpie!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ahaha! Yes, yes, that's right! Then they were invited to the cat-sìth kingdom, and there was that one line—

text_block_list.name: Rob Roy & Taiki
text_block_list.text: "特別に招待しよう。10ポンドでいい" "Just for you, 10 pounds and you're in!"

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Ahaha……! So that's what it's like in Japanese!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: But really! I never thought I would have so much fun talking to you about books, Taiki……!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ………… …… I knew books were amazing.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: (Why did I think it was childish again? They're something that can connect people across borders, across time―)

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Oh, there y'ares! Hoooi, are you two okay?!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Booy, you gave me a scare, you know? With your sudden "HELP ME!". Ah, the other two are searching elsewhere, let me tell them!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Thank you! You found us pretty quick, Tannhauser!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Ah, about that… I thought I spotted a fairy? in black clothes! It was around here so when I got closer, bam! There you were!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, maybe it's just my imagination, butbut this place's full of wonders and good fun for sure!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Not the kinda place your average horsegirl like me would usually find herself～ Whew, for real, I want to see that movie some day!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ah, aaah! Actually……!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Heh? It was a book, not a movie?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ……I-I'm embarrassed to say, but, umm, I thought movies seemed more mature and……

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: …… Hmmm. So, Rob Roy, you're saying that you wanted to look more mature?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, that's not really.…… I just—

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: The… The girls in my class don't read children's books. Unlike me, they're into makeup and such…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: That's why I… became embarrassed…… to talk about books.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: …… Rather than thinking of makeup as grown-up stuff, don't they just like makeup? Much like you're not childish, you just like books. Don't you think?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: …… Weh?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: They're both part of your characters and they're both great. Yeah.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Books or makeup… I'm not seriously into anything whatsoever. So from my point of view, they're both equally amazing.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: At the very least, I'd never have that ping moment looking at the campsite map thinking "it's just like that story!".

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So, mmm…… yeah! You'll be fine, Rob Roy! Right, Taiki!?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yes, all ok!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I'll be fine. …All… fine……

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I see…… that's right……
